subject: Re: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4500 is on the way
description_text:
That’s correct, you are not responsible at all. I am aware of that.
They have my number but refuse to call me for the delivery. My guess is
that they have lost the  shipment.
I Received all the shipments from amazon, aliexpres and ao on with no
isdues whatsoever as usual. Not from TIPSA.
Let me know how to proceed anyway.
Thanks

El El jue, 15 ene 2026 a las 12:07, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
escribió:

>

> error was not caused by us.

conversations.body_text: Hi Josep PC,    I'm sorry for not getting back to you sooner. I see the package has been delivered—did you receive it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209621595

Yes,

It Was delivered yesterday.

Thanks

Do you want me to make a review as a new product of your line up for our
channel
Meroni simracing?

Josep

El El sáb, 17 ene 2026 a las 10:39, service@simsonn.com
